title: Stuck in 'Logging on'

replies.body: OK, well i kinda help scratch the itch hopefully for a few of you. The problem is with the pvp.net client and Optus, not the actual game server (it uses a different server.) if you have another internet provider you can use that to log in, get into a lobby and then either quickly swap net just after the "prepare yourself, the battle is about to begin " screen ends ...(IE after the lobby screen drops but BEFORE it it loads into the loading screen, you'll only have a second to do it, but it does work, tried and tested). and there will be a slight pause and it'll reconnect you using your mobile, and you can play fine. At the end of the game it'll fail to reconnect you to the pvp.net client though so you've to re log. alternatively once everyone loads into the game, and your standing in summoners rift you can swap the net over then and you'll disconnect for about 15 seconds and you'll be able to resume play using your Optus net, this will also work, at least it did for me many times. This took a while for me to figure out, and a lot of fiddling. I don't know if it helps any of you, but you probably can play if you really want to, it's just a sub optimal solution.
cheers man! i think optus might of fixed their shit! im in que right now but it won't log me onto chat, hopefully i can get a game that's all it matters haha
has anyone resolved this mystery problem??? :( im itching for a game haha
Nope pretty much everyone has tried fixing it and everyone has come up short, trust me im itching for a game aswell haha
Awh man :( took work off this week to play leauge and climb! Do you know if anyone is onto this?

I am also with optus.

Mine has been playing up and i am still getting stuck on the "logging in" screen.

it's actually quite sad nothing has been said or done.

Hopefully Riot will be able to reply to this and let us know what is going on.
same here. !!!!!! we need help
Yeah i think this issue has enough people behind to have a solution found, cant believe im missing out on URF hahaha
:(. oh my. iam gonna kill my self. why it only happen with lol?. other game still good. :\
yeahhhh its really unfortunate its happend to my fav game but i can still play csgo and other things at a solid 70-80 ping

"Just got off of the phone with a network consultant at Optus. They've informed me that this is an ongoing issue and has been happening intermittently since September 2014. Apparently it's got something to do with re-authenticating Optus servers once something has changed on the host's side.

There's nothing they can do, i've been advised to just wait it out.

Pretty poor on optus' side but that's all they're able to do for me apparently.

Hope this helps." 

this is from a similar thread. it's kinda annoying.  but apparently we're pretty much screwed until Optus sorts their crap out.
Cheers for the info man, kinda happy this now means i don't have to spend time trying to fix the issue anymore lol, i think its just RNG well just have to get lucky on updates to be able to play.

I posted on the Optus community asking for help but nobody is giving good information back:

https://community.optus.com.au/t5/Mobile/Online-gaming-and-personal-hotspot/m-p/152447/highlight/true#M27798

Has anybody's league started working after the URF update?

Mine has not

mine worked this morning after the Taric patch, but now its back to playing up again. There is something wrong between Optus and the PVP client, but I have no idea on which end. and no idea whats wrong though. Pastaa just let us know if it goes out again like mine did.
yeah mate mines gone too stuck in the 'logging on' faze again

hi guys,

i to am having this problem, has anyone found a solution?

Thanks

also, this guy http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/zh5Lu5sA-optus-wifi-hanging-at-logging-on 
looks like he's having the same problem. There's a problem here. There's just enough wireless mobile users for the forums to be flooded.
Just letting everyoune know as of patch 6.8 (taric rework release) my problems have subsided and its all working again i hope it does for you guys too :D

Glad the issue was resolved, however I doubt it was an issue with the previous patch itself else there would've been mass reports.

More than likely a simple routing issue with your provider or an issue with your DNS.
Quick question. are all you guys with Optus?
yup!
Having this issue as well.

yup. the exact same thing has happened to both me and a friend of mine. weirdly enough it only happens when i use my phone as a wireless hot spot for the net (as i find it much more stable then my regular connection) however I've done this for over a year with no problems, and after the latest patch i can't get past the "logging on" screen, and neither can my friend on his account. it's super annoying.

that is the same as my problem but i don't have access the normal internet so i have to use my phone which for me is a very reliable way to play 76 ping and i never dc, it must be the patch i cant see anything else causing the issue i suppose i just have to wait for a new patch to come out. thank for letting me know im not the only person suffering this issue :D
